## Vector3.scale() method

Scale a Vector3 by a scalar number.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static scale(a: Vector3, b: number, result?: Vector3): Vector3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | The vector to be scaled. |
|  b | number | The scalar number. |
|  result | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | _(Optional)_ The output vector (can be the same vector as a). if not specified, a new vector will be created. |

**Returns:**

[Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md)

The output vector
